706590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Pixies on Parade (5E)
706590.description:
Pixies on Parade

The Pixie Parade is a time-honored event, drawing tourists to the small town of Glavost every year. For these peaceful folk it is a grand feast and excuse for fun, but centuries of tradition leave the origins shrouded in mystery. The citizens are soon to discover all their fairy tales are true.
A brave group of pixies keep the Nightmare King at bay as part of an ancient pact. Now, the bogeyman sets his heir against the defiant fey. When the long-lost boy returns home to lead a final parade, only the towns children have a hope of victory. Can they turn the fey lords magic against him? Can they stand against fear and free an innocent boy?
Pixies on Parade is a stand-alone 5th Edition adventure for 1st 6th level characters recommended for all ages.
This is a must-have, perfect module for kids, a great module for adults, and a book that should be considered simply inspired in all the right ways Endzeitgeist
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Allen Dodge
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
